bustles.headline: Lindt is the best
bustles.author: In
bustles.detail: Contains approximately 75 truffles.  A delicate milk chocolate shell enrobes an irresistibly smooth milk chocolate center.

bustles.headline: THIS SUMMER, CELEBRATE YOURSELF.
bustles.author: Daniel
bustles.detail: Gain entrée into a mysterious kingdom of blue, ripe with temptation…. Court seduction with the most potent strains of Lipstick.

bustles.headline: Exotic choice of the year
bustles.author: Me
bustles.detail: Each Ferrari car is unique. But as a whole, they form a single family built from more than 60 years of expertise in engineering and driving performance.
